As you can see, I did not have much to talk about. I have also deactived the database for this app because I was not using this website often enough to justify keeping it live.

## Purpose

![Mantine Logo](data:image/svg+xml;base64, "Mantine")

I thought it would be a good idea to build out a blog (look at me trying again). This was also early in my React journey and I wanted to try and build a greenfield project to try some more things in React. Every other React app I had built up until this point was using Material UI, so I tried using Mantine during this project. I had heard cool things about Mantine and their rich-text editor.

## Overview

I think this project was cruical for my front-end development growth. This was big for me in terms of how to think about reusing components. The code is no where near perfect, but I'm proud of what I was able to put together for where I was in my career.

### Stack

React and Firebase
[Github Repo](https://github.com/bmurf17/My-Blog)
